class.name: as726x_state_controller/AS726xStateController
class.description: The as726x state controller publishes the current as726x state as an frc_msgs/AS726xState message. The as726x state controller expects a as726x::AS726xStateInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: state_listener_controller/AS726xStateListenerController
class.description: Listens to as726x::AS726xState messages for imus marked as remote, writes their value to the local controller.

class.name: as726x_controller/AS726xController
class.description: The as726x controller allows configuration of sensor setting through either params or dynamic reconfigure
